reviewText: Yes, it's not put together like some would prefer. So much of the news about the Clinton is ignored or covered up by the media that any and all information becomes important. Saw a segment in the news yesterday where Mark Cuba is now supporting Hillary and may help her prepare for the debates. If Hillary becomes President (thanks also, George Sorus) she will load the Supreme Court with liberals or worse and we will surely see our country become a part of the third world while the Clinton's continue to acquire more ill gotten wealth.. Thought Mark Cuba would have better sense, disappointed, Mark.
all good

This DVD focuses on the fate of one or two of her supporters who Hillary later denied knowing after being helped by some past friends.
It's a long drawn-out sad tale of woe that quickly becomes dull,  tedious, and boring.
OK, slow pace talk but interesting about how crooked Hillary got away with political corruption then and still does today. Sad story of our country's government.
Very disappointed.  Stuff said,with NO legal conclussion.  No action taken.

Be careful when ordering this.  It is not the same as Hilary Exposed, seen on Youtube.  It focuses primarily on one incident, namely Senate campaign money scandal.  This seemed more like the product of one man's anger, a personal vendetta, even if it is true.  I wanted all the stuff on Hilary from the beginning, because she is going to be our next president in all likelihood, and I find her more Satanic than any president in our history.
I usually don't care much for documentaries but this one is exceptionally well done and I would recommend it to anyone interested in politics.

What this documentary shows is that Hillary Clinton is guilty of being party to illegal fundraising for her Senate campaign of 2000. It demonstrates that she has no problem with breaking campaign finance laws, if doing so benefits her, as long as the media doesn't find out about it, and she isn't held accountable. She's shown breaking campaign finance laws, lying about it, and attempting to cover it up. This makes her a weaker candidate on the campaign reform issue compared with either Mc Cain, or Obama. Although McCain is even now trying to break or bend the laws he once helped establish. None of this is surprising as the Clintons have a reputation for being relentless power grabbers. It's important to note that there is nothing partisan about this documentary, it is based on footage shot by a former Clinton fundraiser, who was used then tossed away like a piece of garbage when he became a political liability. It raised questions for me regarding Hillary's character, her inability to be truthful, and accountable for her actions, two traits i despise about our current president.

This movie brings it all back home.  Watch it and remember why America breathed a sigh of relief when those two grifters left the Whitehouse, pardoning terrorists and stealing furniture.

Remember Billy Dale?

How dare we forget...

"Those who forget the past are doomed to relive it...."
Makes you think. Must watch if you are at least curious of the possibility of corrupt government.
Great
Very informative! Glad we spent the money before the 2016 election!

A Clinton supporter that got burned! He lost a lot of money, was involved with some illegal fund raising, and can't understand why he can't get such obvious evidence to court in his lawsuit against the Clintons!!!!
A history lesson within a history lesson. Thoughtful written and portrayed!
Great pic exposing that Crook Hillary!!!!  Hey Donald, MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!!!!!! ;)
Finally the truth is told. Good for the soul to hear truth again
Excellent documentary.  Why doesn't the media tell us these facts!
So glad she wasn't elected - she would have ruined this country even further.
She lost.  This helped with that.
it said what i have always thought about her  it makes  me sad to think that she  has that much power over us .
GOOD DVD
will not play on any of my dvd or bluray players.  very choppy and not viewable at all  do NOT buy this product
WOW, shows the deception and abuse by both Clintons to get what they want. Even to point of using supporters & throwing them away. They really are a criminal family!
You are all imbeciles .....Like all of Trumps ridiculous followers who are the lowest common denominator of ignorant illiterates and quite dangerous to the rest of the country.
Read the book. There's MORE to Hillary than you see on TV. AND it's not good.
Very revealing  d v d  on Clinton's bad politics.
its is great but it left out a lot about both of them
no CD

The Clinton Foundation scandal is a repeat of what happened in 2000 with Peter Paul who was her biggest contributor (over $1.2 million). She denied knowing him and forgot all of their conversations.  Sound familiar with what is happening with the Clinton Foundation, email scandal, etc.??  History repeating itself!

Good news! Peter Paul had recorded videos, audio tapes and had written letters from Bill and Hillary, receipts, and much more and it is all shown in this video that is banned by the media. I wonder why???

Eh, another diatribe about the Clintons and other right wing conspiracies. Preaching to the choir, etc. Wake me up when when something new comes along. *yawn*

Funny little tidbit: "When sold by Amazon.com, this product will be manufactured on demand using DVD-R recordable media."

Gotta recognize opportunism when it arises.

This is frightening to think how an American attorney, first lady, politician and how president Obama hired her as our secretary of state is this corrupt and holds a heartfelt disregard for American law and also our national security, she can bribe and lie endlessly to coerce her associates to commit crimes that any of us everyday citizens would be indicted, prosecuted, convicted and locked up in federal prison with sentences longer than attempting to count the money at fort Knox.
EVERYBODY SHOULD HAVE ACCESS TO THIS EYE OPENING TO THE MUST CORRUPT PERSON EVER RUN FOR THE PRESIDENT OF THE USA....
Great seller and you need to watch the dvd!
love it
The Wicked Witch of the West Rides Again!
Thank God she didn't win!
This lets you know who Hillary Clinton really is.
